title: Cinema Paradiso
overview: Alfredo recounts his childhood when he fell in love with the movies at the village's theater.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman raises the stakes in his war on crime.

title: Forrest Gump
overview: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson through the eyes of Forrest Gump.

title: Braveheart
overview: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads revolt against England.

title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance at redemption.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team travels through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Pulp Fiction
overview: Stories of crime intertwine in this cult classic.

title: Fight Club
overview: An insomniac meets a soap-maker and forms an underground fight club.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker discovers reality is a simulation.

title: Gladiator
overview: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of the Corleone crime family transfers control to his reluctant son.

title: The Godfather Part II
overview: The early life of Vito Corleone and his son's rise in power.

title: The Green Mile
overview: A death row guard discovers a prisoner with a supernatural gift.

title: Se7en
overview: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins.

title: Saving Private Ryan
overview: Soldiers search for a missing paratrooper during WWII.

title: The Lion King
overview: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after tragedy.

title: Spirited Away
overview: A girl enters a magical world ruled by spirits.

title: The Prestige
overview: Two magicians become bitter rivals.

title: Joker
overview: A mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral.

title: Whiplash
overview: A young drummer enrolls in a cutthroat music conservatory.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
overview: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort.

title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora.

title: Titanic
overview: Two people from different worlds fall in love aboard the RMS Titanic.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together.
